dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:253,440]. Relief shown by hachures, shading and spot heights. Title derived from index map. Bottom right on each sheet:"Eng. by J. & C. Walker". Bottom left on each sheet states surveyors for that section of the work ; surveyors include J.A. Hodgson, J.D. Herbert, Bedford & Jones, C. Mackenzie. Includes index map"Index to the Indian Atlas" dated 1827. Index shows intention to produce 177 maps.|53 x 75 centimeters|Scale [1:253,440]|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dc_publisher_s: James Horsburgh Hydrographer to the Hon. East India Company; London
